content:
Hello World! This is my first post in Hugo.
I am excited to start building my new website with this powerful static site generator.
Hugo makes it easy to quickly create content and customize my site exactly how I want it.
The default templates and themes provide a great starting point, so I don’t have to start completely from scratch.
I can’t wait to add more posts and share my knowledge with the world!
title: My First Post

content: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!
title: Hello World!
